timeline.bodyText: @Zidane I know you like final things, but this is intended to be overriden by SpongeForge to add any additional commands it sees fit, like /sponge mods, and injected via Guice (so it'll need an explicit binding on SF).
timeline.author: dualspiral

timeline.message:
Add more Sponge commands:

* /sponge which
* /sponge version
* /sponge plugin <plugin>

Also ensure suggestions that are returned get filtered by startsWith

Also also: generics are a bit better now
